mainText:
I just want to say to Steve 'Thank you' and 'Good bye'. When I was in Japan, back in 2000, I purchased my first computer which is an iMac.
It was truly amazing and the greatest thing I have ever purchased.
I will never forget when I turned on my iMac for the very first time in my room.
Since then, I had so many great experiences with your products.
I am so sad and you will be missed, Steve.
RIP
author: Nagisa
